timeline.bodyText: resteasy can be removed, quarkus-spring-web already depends on it.
timeline.author: aloubyansky
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,17 @@
+name: spring-web-example
+ref: spring-web
+type: code
+tags: example
+language:
+  base:
+    data:
+      resource:
+        class-name: ExampleController
+        path: "/springweb/hello"
+        response: "hello"
+      package-name: org.acme.spring.web
+    dependencies:
+      - io.quarkus:quarkus-resteasy

timeline.message:
feat: add codestart spring-web

refactor: resteasy not needed here, quarkus-spring-web already depends on it.
